channel.title: News on Department of Atmospheric Sciences, Yonsei University
channel.description: Recent content in News on Department of Atmospheric Sciences, Yonsei University

item.title: Prof. Sanghun Park Received the Outstanding Lecturer Award
item.description: Outstanding Lecturer Award Prof. Sanghun Park received the outstanding lecturer award in the undergraduate school of college of science.

item.title: Prof. Seongsoo Yum Received the Outstanding Lecturer Award
item.description: Outstanding Lecturer Award Prof. Seongsoo Yum received the outstanding lecturer award in the graduate school of college of science.

item.title: Prof. Dong-bin Shin received the Outstanding Achievement Award
item.description: Outstanding Achievement Award Prof. Dong-bin Shin received the outstanding award in research and research fund.

item.title: Prof. Jhoon Kim Received the Contribution Award
item.description: Contribution Award Prof. Jhoon Kim received the contribution award from Yonsei university for his education, research and charity work.

item.title: Prof. Jhoon Kim Received the Scientist of the Month Award
item.description: Scientist of the Month Prof. Jhoon Kim was selected as the “Scientist of the Month” for January 2018 by the Korea Research Foundation(NRF), Ministry of Science, Technology and ICT.
